title: Mr. Boltons last and learned worke of the foure last things death, iudgement, hell, and heauen. With an assises-sermon, and notes on Iustice Nicolls his funerall. Together with the life and death of the authour. Published by E.B.
author: Bolton, Robert, 1572-1631.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by George Miller, dwelling in the Black-Friers,
